item.title: 泰铢快速走强后泰国央行加强对外汇流入的审查
item.description: 泰铢本月快速上涨后，泰国央行下令对涉及美元销售的外汇交易，尤其是与黄金有关的交易进行更严格的检查，以遏制资金流入。【原文：Thailand’s central bank ordered stricter checks on foreign-exchange transactions involving dollar sales, especially those related to gold, to curb inflows after the baht’s rapid gains this month.】

item.title: 日本央行加息押注增加，日元表现优于主要同类货币
item.description: 在日本央行普遍预期本周将上调基准利率之前，日元的表现优于所有主要同类货币，交易员们正在等待美国的关键经济数据。【原文：The yen outperforms all its major peers ahead of the Bank of Japan’s widely anticipated move to lift its benchmark interest rate this week, as traders await key US economic data.】

item.title: 欧盟放弃内燃机禁令，汽车制造商获胜
item.description: 在汽车行业数月的压力下，欧盟将提议放宽新车的排放规定，取消对内燃机的有效禁令。【原文：The European Union is set to propose softening emissions rules for new cars, scrapping an effective ban on combustion engines following months of pressure from the automotive industry.】

item.title: 北欧联合银行推出 5 亿欧元回购，以提高派息率
item.description: 北欧联合银行（Nordea Bank Abp）宣布回购价值高达 5 亿欧元（5.87 亿美元）的新股，以增加对投资者的回报。【原文：Nordea Bank Abp announced a new share buyback worth as much as €500 million ($587 million) as it seeks to increase payouts to investors.】

item.title: 泰国加强船只检查以遏制对柬埔寨的供应
item.description: 随着两国边境紧张局势的持续，泰国正加大对国内航运船只的检查力度，以防止燃料和军用物资被转移到柬埔寨。【原文：Thailand is stepping up efforts to inspect domestic shipping vessels in a bid to prevent fuel and military supplies being diverted to Cambodia as the border tension between the two nations persists.】

item.title: 据说 Zepto 计划下周提交 5 亿美元的印度首次公开募股申请
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着印度快速电子商务市场竞争的白热化，杂货配送公司 Zepto Ltd. 正准备最早于下周在孟买申请首次公开募股，募集资金约 5 亿美元。【原文：Grocery delivery firm Zepto Ltd. is preparing to file for an initial public offering of about $500 million in Mumbai as early as next week, according to people familiar with the matter, as competition hots up in India’s quick-commerce market.】

item.title: 英国央行会议前劳动力市场放缓，英国失业率上升
item.description: 英国失业率攀升至近五年来的最高水平，工资增长放缓，劳动力市场降温似乎为英国央行圣诞节前降息扫清了最后一道障碍。【原文：UK unemployment climbed to its highest level in almost five years and wage growth eased as a cooling labor market appeared to clear one of the final hurdles to a pre-Christmas interest-rate cut by the Bank of England.】

item.title: 影子银行突破 250 万亿美元大关，监管机构就数据发出警告
item.description: 金融稳定委员会（Financial Stability Board）的最新数据显示，全球影子银行部门的资产规模首次突破了250万亿美元大关，这加剧了人们对监管较少的金融部门的系统性风险不断增加的担忧。【原文：Global assets in the sprawling shadow banking sector have crossed the $250 trillion mark for the first time, new data from the Financial Stability Board shows, fueling fears of mounting systemic risks from less regulated corners of the financial sector.】

item.title: Holcim 公司斥资 7.5 亿美元收购秘鲁公司多数股权
item.description: Holcim Ltd. 将收购秘鲁建材生产商 Cementos Pacasmayo 的大部分股份，这是该公司在拉丁美洲最大的一笔收购。【原文：Holcim Ltd. is buying a majority stake in Cementos Pacasmayo, a building materials producer in Peru, its largest acquisition in Latin America.】

item.title: MUFG 下任首席执行官寻求增长以缩小与全球竞争对手的差距
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.他面临的挑战将是在利率上升带来的好处之外，如何保持这种增长。【原文：Junichi Hanzawa, the next chief executive officer of Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc., will take the reins of Japan’s largest bank as it rakes in record profits. His challenge will be sustaining that growth beyond the windfall of rising interest rates.】

item.title: 英国 10 月份工资涨幅高于预期
津巴布韦 Econet 将退市，计划基础设施部门上市
item.description: Econet Wireless Zimbabwe Ltd.将自愿从津巴布韦证券交易所退市，理由是该公司的估值与地区同行相比一直存在折扣。【原文：Econet Wireless Zimbabwe Ltd. will voluntarily delist from the Zimbabwe Stock Exchange, citing a persistent valuation discount to regional peers.】

item.title: 安杜里尔将其价值数十亿美元的无人机玩法带到英国
item.description:
随着欧洲的反弹，这家美国武器制造商正试图通过共同资助重大项目、达成制造协议以及标榜自己为 "英美 "公司等方式在英国取得突破。【原文：

As Europe rearms, the US weapons maker is trying to break through in the UK by co-funding major programs, cutting manufacturing deals, and billing itself as an ‘Anglo-American’ company.

】

item.title: 马来西亚总理称将于周二发布特别内阁公告
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，他将于当地时间周二下午 3:30 宣布新内阁成员名单。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said he would announce new members of his cabinet at 3:30 p.m. local time on Tuesday.】

item.title: 私募股权公司隆力奇被指酝酿出售温迪日本餐厅
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亚洲私募股权公司隆力奇集团正在考虑出售其在日本汉堡连锁店温迪第一厨房（Wendy's First Kitchen）的大部分股份。【原文：Asian private equity firm Longreach Group is considering selling its majority stake in the hamburger chain Wendy’s First Kitchen in Japan, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 研究人员称芯片紧缩将在 2026 年抑制智能手机产量
item.description: 据行业跟踪机构 Counterpoint Research 称，由于内存芯片短缺导致成本上升并挤压产量，明年全球智能手机出货量可能下降 2.1%。【原文：Global smartphone shipments may decline 2.1% next year as a shortage of memory chips drives up costs and squeezes production, according to industry tracker Counterpoint Research.】

item.title: 野村认为韩国央行将在 2026 年维持利率不变，加息风险上升
item.description: 据野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：The Bank of Korea is done with its interest rate-cutting cycle and is likely to keep interest rates unchanged in 2026, with risks now tilting toward a hike as the next move as growth strengthens, according to Nomura Holdings Inc.】

item.title: 美国谈判受阻，印度 12 月制造业活动降温
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收的50%关税继续对劳动密集型产业造成压力，印度12月份的经济活动有所放缓。【原文：India’s economic activity eased in December, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed, as President Donald Trump’s 50% tariffs continue to weigh on labor-intensive industries.】

item.title: 棕榈油三周来首次跌破 4,000 林吉特
item.description: 棕榈油跌破每吨 4,000 林吉特，触及三周来的最低水平，原因是棕榈油追随豆油的疲软走势，并面临马来西亚出口疲软的压力。【原文：Palm oil fell below 4,000 ringgit a ton, touching its lowest level in three weeks, as it tracked weakness in soybean oil and faced pressure from dull exports out of Malaysia.】

item.title: 据说 Affinity 正在探索出售 Plaza Premium 集团的股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Affinity Equity Partners 正在考虑出售其在机场酒店管理公司 Plaza Premium Group 的股份。【原文：Affinity Equity Partners is considering selling its stake in airport hospitality firm Plaza Premium Group, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 福林看似脆弱，匈牙利风险在 2025 年反弹后飙升
item.description: 随着 2026 年的临近，在新兴市场年中一枝独秀的发展中国家货币匈牙利福林正变得越来越脆弱。【原文：The standout developing-nation currency in the year of emerging markets — Hungary’s forint — is looking increasingly vulnerable as 2026 nears.】

item.title: 2026 年值得关注的 50 家公司
item.description:
关注这些全球股票，从波音和 Reddit 到耐克和加拿大鹅。【原文：

Keep an eye on these global stocks, from Boeing and Reddit to Nike and Canada Goose.

】

item.title: 让债券交易员痴迷的荷兰养老金转变即将成为现实
item.description:
欧洲政府债券的最大持有者之一可能会引发一阵波动—就在许多市场参与者离开办公桌的时候。【原文：

One of the biggest owners of European government bonds could trigger a bout of volatility — just as many market participants are away from their desks.

】

item.title: 中东基准等级石油出现供应过剩迹象
item.description: 中东迪拜石油基准正显示出供过于求加剧的迹象，这与一系列表明全球供应过剩的指标如出一辙。【原文：The Middle East’s Dubai oil benchmark is showing signs of worsening oversupply, adding to a slew of indicators pointing to a global glut.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉石油储存在海上，在美国压力上升时保护中国
item.description: 如果美国对欧佩克产油国的敌对行动升级并中断出口，囤积在海上油轮上的委内瑞拉原油将为中国炼油商（最大的买家）提供缓冲。【原文：A hoard of Venezuelan crude on tankers at sea will provide a cushion for Chinese refiners — the biggest buyers — should the US escalate hostilities against the OPEC producer and disrupt exports.】

item.title: 北汽集团、长安汽车获批三级驾驶辅助系统
item.description: 北汽集团（BAIC Motor Corp. ）和长安汽车股份有限公司（CHANGAN AUTO Co.【原文：BAIC Motor Corp. and Changan Auto Co. rose Tuesday after the two state-controlled automakers received China’s first permits for Level 3 advanced driver assistance, allowing conditional driverless operations in designated areas.】

item.title: 总统与反对派的政治对峙令台湾焦头烂额
item.description: 台湾总统赖清德指责反对党滥用立法权，使其针对反对党的言辞不断升级，台湾岛内因财政支出冲突而陷入党派纷争。【原文：Taiwan’s President Lai Ching-te has escalated his rhetoric against opposition parties by accusing them of abusing their legislative power, as the island descends into partisan strife after a clash over fiscal spending.】

item.title: 韩国养老基金将在外汇稳定方面发挥更大作用
item.description: 随着韩元的疲软，韩国国营养老基金将在确保货币稳定方面发挥更大作用。【原文：South Korea’s state-run pension fund is set to take a larger role in ensuring currency stability as the nation battles weakness in the won.】

item.title: 澳大利亚两大银行认为澳大利亚央行将在二月份加息
item.description: 澳大利亚两家顶级贷款机构周二表示，他们预计储备银行将在二月份恢复加息，以应对经济中持续存在的价格压力。【原文：Two of Australia’s top lenders said on Tuesday they expect the Reserve Bank will return to interest-rate increases in February in order to tackle persistent price pressures in the economy.】

item.title: 越南市场跌势扩大，VPS 证券首秀下跌
item.description: VPS 证券股份公司的股票在周二的首次交易中下跌，追随着更广泛的市场低迷，这已将越南股市推向自 2022 年以来最长的连跌期。【原文：Shares of VPS Securities JSC declined in their trading debut on Tuesday, tracking a broader market downturn that has pushed Vietnamese stocks toward their longest losing streak since 2022.】
